about.specialties:
Award winning view of the Golden Gate Bridge, and Alcatraz!
Waterfront outdoor seating available
First restaurant on Fisherman's Wharf with 100% sustainable seafood.
Fresh fish delivered and hand cut daily.
Fresh sourdough bread baked every 30 minutes.
New England Clam Chowder made from scratch daily.
Vast California wine list and full bar with premium liquor

history.history_text: Fog Harbor Fish House offers the quintessential San Francisco waterfront dining experience. Steeped in tradition, Fog Harbor Fish House was created by the original developers of PIER 39 and is filled with a quarter century of San Francisco history. Family-owned and operated, Fog Harbor Fish House is among the most favored restaurants on the Wharf where we pride ourselves in offering the freshest seafood in San Francisco.

owner.name: Bob P.
owner.about: Bob Partrite is the Chief Operating Officer of the Simco Restaurant group on Pier 39. He is passionate about serving fresh sustainable seafood and creating a dining experience that is memorable. His goal is to exceed guests expectations and you will find him in our restaurants on a daily basis. &#34;We are your local PIER 39 restaurant, come visit us and see why&#34;.<br><br>Warren Simmons was the visionary behind the creation, conceptualizing and development of what would become one of the world&#39;s most famous landmarks: PIER 39. Today, over 30 years later, Simco Restaurants continues to own and operate the most successful restaurants on Fisherman&#39;s Wharf including the award-winning Pier Market Restaurant, Fog Harbor Fish House, Wipeout Bar &amp; Grill, Eagle Cafe and Biscoff Coffee Corner.
